channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Saronic unveils autonomous vessel and acquires Gulf Craft to boost production
item.description: Saronic has retained the experience workforce of Gulf Craft and expects to prototype and build medium uncrewed surface vessels. The post Saronic unvei...

item.title: Netflix wants to be a $1 trillion company. Earnings show why that’s a reasonable goal.
item.description: Analysts see Netflix generating growth even in a recession.

item.title: Comau to acquire warehousing automation firm Automha in strategic expansion
item.description: Comau plans to acquire fellow Italian company Automha to expand into the logistics sector. The post Comau to acquire warehousing automation firm Autom...

item.title: Aethir launches AI Unbundled industry alliance for Web3 AI development
item.description: Aethir, a provider of decentralized GPU cloud compute, announced the launch of AI Unbundled, an industry-wide alliance for Web3 AI.

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

item.title: Yarbo closes Series B funding to continue yard robot expansion

item.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
item.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

item.title: Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon. These strategies offer upside and downside protection.
item.description: Ed Yardeni argues that, to match the doom and gloom from Wall Street bears, the stock market would need to see a Lehman-esque meltdown.

item.title: Identity as the new perimeter: NOV’s approach to stopping the 79% of attacks that are malware-free
item.description: NOV’s CIO led a cyber strategy fusing Zero Trust, AI, and airtight identity controls to cut threats by 35x and eliminating reimaging.
